sources.title: Doctor's Orders
sources.description: Bill Blake, a jovial con man is known to friends and his son as a traveling salesman, but in reality, operates a phony medicine show, complete with singing, and a monkey. Â His son Ronnie has studied to become a doctor and interns at a nearby hospital. The boy's love interest is a nurse there, but his rival is anxious to expose his father as a market quack to ruin him.

metadata.Actors: Franklin Pangborn, Natalie Kingston, Lincoln Stedman
